profile.title: User Profile
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. All your data, including brands and associated information, will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteSuccess: Your account has been successfully deleted. Redirecting...

deleteDialog.title: Delete Account
deleteDialog.message: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data. You will lose access to all brands, outlets, and related information. This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.passwordHelper: Type your current password to confirm account deletion
deleteDialog.passwordRequired: Password is required to delete your account
